projects.name: PipeX CRM
projects.description: PipeX CRM – A simple application that can help you to improve customer relationship to grow your business more efficiently. You can manage your company’s associations in a friendly interface and with a low learning curve.
highlights: Implemented microservices architecture for better scalability
Reduced page load time by 70% through optimization
A awesome pipeline based architecture for lead generation implenemented

projects.name: Mailer
projects.description: Mailer – Email Marketing Application is the easiest way to send email marketing newsletters! Create your brands, add campaigns and monitor progression. Mailer has powerful features to create dynamic lists using different segments. Stop wasting monthly subscription fees and make your newsletter marketing more professional.
highlights: Implemented core email marketing features like automation workflows and campaign management.
Enabled unlimited email sends and powerful automation.
projects.architecture: Frontend (VueJS) <--> Web Server (Laravel) <--> MySQL DB | Background: Laravel Queue Workers (Redis/SQS) for high-volume email processing.

projects.name: Unite Living
projects.description: Project details are confidential according to company policy. Implemented a complex, large-scale distributed system.
highlights: Developed a large-scale, distributed system using AWS serverless components (Lambda, SQS, S3).
projects.architecture: Client (Vue/Meteor) <--> GraphQL API (ExpressJS) <--> MongoDB | Backend: Event-Driven Serverless (AWS SQS/Lambda/S3) for distributed processing.

projects.name: Digital Bondhu
projects.description: A job platform similar to BDJobs.
highlights: Built core job platform functionalities including job listings, searching, and user profiles.
projects.architecture: Standard LAMP/LEMP Stack: Frontend (Blade/Vue) <--> API (Laravel) <--> Database (MySQL).

projects.name: Treasure Wars - MMORPG Game
projects.description: MMORPG Game development using C# and Unity3D.
highlights: Developed game logic and backend services for a massively multiplayer online role-playing game (MMORPG).
projects.architecture: Client (Unity/C#) <--> Game Server (Custom/Node/PHP) <--> DB (MySQL). Focus on low-latency communication.

projects.name: Meena Media Award
projects.description: System for managing the Meena Media Award for Unicef Bangladesh.
highlights: Implemented a system for managing award submissions and the judging process.
projects.architecture: Web App (Laravel) <--> MySQL DB. Features: Multi-user roles (Submitter, Judge, Admin) and secure data handling.

projects.name: Adolescent
projects.description: Web application project for Unicef Bangladesh focused on adolescent issues.
highlights: Developed a web application for a social awareness or resource distribution project.
projects.architecture: Web App (Laravel) <--> MySQL DB. Focus on user engagement, content delivery, and access control.
